column2: Accordingly,  this Court enlarges the accused on bail upon following

the accused  must present two sureties, who are acceptable to  the
High  Court and  pledge Rs. One Million  on surety  bonds.  They
must  also  be  permanent  residents  of  jurisdiction  of  the  High
